thread.title: Civil rights 'Freedom Riders' consider MLK's legacy, 50 years after his death

title: Civil rights 'Freedom Riders' consider MLK's legacy, 50 years after his death
text:
Civil rights 'Freedom Riders' consider MLK's legacy, 50 years after his death 12:36am EDT - 01:47 
Fifty years after the assassination of Martin Luther King Jr, civil rights 'Freedom Riders' consider what has and hasn't changed in U.S. race relations since they challenged segregation on public transport in the 1960s. Rough Cut (no reporter narration) ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
